entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as briskly buttering herself some toast and adding liberal amounts of jam to her toast. She is also mentioned as haughtily saying she has decided there are better ways of making a stand about elf rights.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as watching Hermione add jam to her toast and grinning at her. He is also mentioned as noticing that Hermione was hungry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as instinctively looking up when he hears a sudden rustling noise above them.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as almost always forgetting to pack something and receiving a parcel from a tawny owl.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as having an eagle that circled the tables looking for people to whom their letters and packages were addressed.

relationships.description: Hermione and Ron are interacting with each other, with Ron watching Hermione add jam to her toast and grinning at her.
Harry is observing Hermione as she eats her toast.
A tawny owl delivers a parcel to Neville Longbottom.
Draco Malfoy has an eagle that circled the tables looking for people to whom their letters and packages were addressed.
